name: Anaconda
description: The anaconda is a large snake that primarily resides in aquatic environments, where it uses its powerful body to constrict and overpower prey, often lurking just beneath the water's surface before striking.
tactics: The anaconda waits patiently beneath murky water for prey to approach. It strikes swiftly to grapple victims, then either constricts them to death or swallows smaller prey whole. It uses its Grapple of Opportunity to prevent escape attempts.

actions.name: Strike
actions.description: The anaconda lashes out against a target within 2 units and bites them, dealing physical damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: The anaconda tightens its coils around a creature that it has grappled, dealing crushing damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: After using the Strike action against a medium or smaller creature they have grappled, the anaconda swallows that target. While swallowed in this way, the creature has the grappled and enveloped condition and can only escape by making an acrobatics or athletics check of 10 or higher.

reactions.name: Grapple of Opportunity
reactions.trigger: When a creature attempts to leave the anaconda's area of control
reactions.description: The anaconda uses the grapple action against them with +1 bonus die.

traits.name: Efficient Grappling
traits.description: The anaconda can grapple creatures that are one size larger than it.

traits.name: Aquatic Predator
traits.description: The anaconda can move through water at full speed and hold its breath for up to 30 minutes.

traits.name: Tremorsense
traits.description: The anaconda can detect vibrations through ground and water within 10 units.
